fields.description: The Competency Name of the Competency.  When adding a new Competency, duplicate names are not allowed.
The Description of the Competency will be the same everywhere.  If Applies to All Levels is not marked True, Descriptions can be modified for each Management Level or Compensation Grade
The Competency Category for the Competency.
Defines a Proficiency Rating used in a Competency.
Boolean which indicates if the Competency is inactive.
During implementation, we recommend using a date of 01-01-1900 for the initial entry.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Boolean to specify if competency behaviors apply to all levels.
Check this box if you would like to use this Competency as the horizontal axis when setting up nBox reports for the Talent Matrix.

Behaviors_Apply_to_All_Levels.description: Boolean to specify if competency behaviors apply to all levels.

Competency_Category_Reference.description: The Competency Category for the Competency.

Competency_Name.description: The Competency Name of the Competency.  When adding a new Competency, duplicate names are not allowed.

Description_Applies_to_All_Levels.description: The Description of the Competency will be the same everywhere.  If Applies to All Levels is not marked True, Descriptions can be modified for each Management Level or Compensation Grade

Effective_Date.description: During implementation, we recommend using a date of 01-01-1900 for the initial entry.

Inactive.description: Boolean which indicates if the Competency is inactive.

Proficiency_Rating_Behavior_Data.description: Defines a Proficiency Rating used in a Competency.

Proficiency_Rating_Scale_Reference_Ratin.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Proficiency_Rating_Scale_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Used_For_Talent_Matrix.description: Check this box if you would like to use this Competency as the horizontal axis when setting up nBox reports for the Talent Matrix.
